target: Alright, so you would like to book 3 rooms for 3 days at Adina Apartment Hotel Bondi Beach Sydney, located in Sydney, checking on on March 3rd. Is that correct?
context: <user>  I need to find a room at a four star hotel in Sydney, Australia. <system>  I found 10 hotels you might like. Hohw about 28 Hotel Sydney? It's a nice 4 star hotel. <user>  Anything else? I need three rooms. <system>  I found 9 other hotels matching your query. How bout 57 Hotel? It is a nice 4 star hotel. <user>  Anything else I might like? <system>  Sure, what about Adina Apartment Hotel Bondi Beach Sydney? It is another 4 star hotel. <user>  Okay that one sounds good. <system>  Do you want to reserve a room there?<user>  Yeah, can you help me with that? <system>  When do you want to check and, and how long will you be staying?<user>  I want to check in Sunday this week and stay for three days. <system>
